title: Are there no limits to dark side of artificial intelligence?
description: Concern has been voiced worldwide over the unfettered nature of Grok and other AI programs in the production of deepfake images. Read more.
content:

title: UK watchdog launches probe into Grok AI's sexualised imagery on X
description: LONDON, Jan 12 : The UK’s Office of Communications (Ofcom) on Monday launched an investigation into X over the “deeply concerning” reports of its Grok artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot generating sexualised imagery to determine if it breached the country’s Online Safety Act. The independent media watchdog said it had urgently made contact with X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter, last week. The Elon Musk-owned company was set a “firm deadline” of January 9 to explain what steps […]

title: Technology must be guided by compassion for inclusive development: UP CM Yogi
description: LUCKNOW, Jan 12 : Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath emphasised on Monday that development becomes truly inclusive and the future secure when technology is guided by compassion, policy is driven by innovation, and governance rests on trust. Addressing the inaugural session of a two-day conference on ‘AI in Transforming Healthcare’ here, Yogi said, “Artificial Intelligence (AI) is emerging as a powerful instrument to transform governance from a reactive approach to a proactive one.” He announced that under the UP […]

title: Meta to cut about 10% of employees in Reality Labs business
description: Meta plans to cut about 10% of the employees in its Reality Labs division who work on products including the metaverse, as the company shifts priorities to build next-generation artificial intelligence.
content: SAN FRANCISCO — Meta plans to cut about 10% of the employees in its Reality Labs division who work on products including the metaverse, according to three people with knowledge of the discussions, as the company shifts priorities to build next-genera... [3755 chars]
